text:
[Verse]
Lights are low and shadows sway
Music pulses night and day
Rhythms echo through the crowd
Feel the beat it gets so loud

[Verse 2]
Hearts collide on moonlit floors
Footsteps sync and spirits soar
Lost in moments time stands still
Chasing dreams we always will

[Chorus]
Dancing shadows on the wall
Feel the magic feel the call
Spin and turn just let it flow
In this place we let it go

[Verse 3]
Bassline whispers in the night
Stars above they shine so bright
Hands held high we reach the sky
In this rhythm we can fly

[Chorus]
Dancing shadows on the wall
Feel the magic feel the call
Spin and turn just let it flow
In this place we let it go

[Bridge]
Every step a journey new
Together me and you
In the dance our souls align
Bound by music space and time
title: Dancing Shadows
